# Project Setup Instructions

## Completed Steps
- [x] Create Next.js workspace structure
- [x] Set up Git repository
- [x] Create basic page components
- [x] Install dependencies
- [x] Documentation complete

## Project Details
This is a Next.js 14 React TypeScript project with the App Router, following modern conventions for CSS modules and React components.

## Development
- Run `npm run dev` to start the development server
- Navigate to http://localhost:3000 to view the application
- Components are in the `src/components` directory
- Pages use the App Router in the `src/app` directory
- CSS Modules follow the naming convention: `ComponentName.module.css`
